intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Catalisa ("we", "our" or "Catalisa") operates the WhatsApp automation platform with artificial intelligence. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
items: Registration data: name, email, phone, company
Usage data: platform interactions, access logs
Communication data: messages processed by the platform
Technical data: IP address, browser, device

use.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell your personal information. We share data only with:
items: AI providers (Anthropic, OpenAI) for natural language processing
Competent authorities when required by law

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your information:
items: Encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest (AES-256)
Infrastructure hosted in data centers in Brazil

rights.title: Your Rights (LGPD)
rights.text: In accordance with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD), you have the right to:
items: Confirm the existence of data processing
Request anonymization or deletion of data

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp and Meta
whatsapp.text: Our platform uses the WhatsApp Business API. Processed messages are subject to WhatsApp/Meta's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. We do not store message content beyond what is necessary for the operation of configured workflows.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.text: You can request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us. Data will be removed within 30 days, except when there is a legal obligation for retention.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: We retain your data for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. Account data is retained while the account is active. Audit logs are kept for 12 months.

children.title: Minors
children.text: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not intentionally collect data from minors.

changes.title: Changes to this Policy
changes.text: We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated by email or platform notification.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about this policy:

consent.title: Consent
consent.text: By using our platform, you consent to the collection and use of information as described in this Privacy Policy.
